@Icon[type:photon] Photon Revelation

When you activate your supernova stellar revelation while in an area with an atmosphere, you can choose for the revelation to create intense turbulence in the affected area. Your supernova disperses fog, smoke, and similar effects as though it were strong wind. At the beginning of your next turn, the air implodes toward the areaâ€™s center, creating strong winds for 1 round and causing all creatures with the burning condition in the area to immediately take fire damage equal to the damage dealt by their burning condition (Reflex negates the additional damage).
